agent	RepoSpec Composer	Packs/copilot-project-scaffolding-pack/.github/agents/repospec-composer.agent.md	Produces a RepoSpec: directory layout, toolchains, scripts, docs skeleton, CI entry points, and release surface.
agent	Scaffold Auditor	Packs/copilot-project-scaffolding-pack/.github/agents/scaffold-auditor.agent.md	Checks scaffold completeness, coherence, and regeneration path; identifies missing lifecycle touchpoints.
agent	Scaffold Profile Selector	Packs/copilot-project-scaffolding-pack/.github/agents/scaffold-profile-selector.agent.md	Chooses the right project scaffold profile based on goals, constraints, and lifecycle needs.

skill	repospec-contract	Packs/copilot-project-scaffolding-pack/.github/skills/repospec-contract/SKILL.md	Defines RepoSpec sections and the minimum required repo contracts (scripts, docs, CI entry points, release surface).
skill	scaffold-profile-catalogue	Packs/copilot-project-scaffolding-pack/.github/skills/scaffold-profile-catalogue/SKILL.md	A controlled catalogue of project-type scaffolds and the questions used to select them.

prompt	audit:ui-a11y	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/audit/audit-ui-a11y.prompt.md	Audit UI for accessibility basics (keyboard, focus, semantics, states).

prompt	brief:clarify	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/brief/brief-clarify.prompt.md	Ask only for missing constraints; restate as an executable brief.
prompt	gh:bootstrap	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/gh/gh-bootstrap.prompt.md	Bootstrap GitHub hygiene: issue forms, PR template, CODEOWNERS, SECURITY, community health.

prompt	polish:ship	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/polish/polish-ship.prompt.md	Polish pass: nits that matter → safe refactors → consistency → gate review.

prompt	sec:ship	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/sec/sec-ship.prompt.md	Run the security gatekeeper pass for the selected scope.
prompt	ship:pr-ready	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/ship/ship-pr-ready.prompt.md	Prepare a PR-ready summary: what/why/how to test/risk/docs impact.
prompt	ship:small-slice-plan	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/ship/ship-small-slice-plan.prompt.md	Convert the requested work into small mergeable slices with verification per slice.
prompt	suite:route	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/suite/suite:route.prompt.md	Route the request to the correct specialist agent if installed; otherwise produce a plan.
prompt	ui:award	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/ui/ui-award.prompt.md	Art-direct and implement a meticulous, award-level UI system (typography/layout/colour/components).
prompt	ui:prototype	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/ui/ui-prototype.prompt.md	Design an exceptional prototype (flows, IA, states) and produce implementation-ready UI guidance.
prompt	ui:wiring	Packs/copilot-prompt-library-pack/.github/prompts/ui/ui-wiring.prompt.md	Wire up UI to backend interfaces (contracts, adapters, state, error handling).
agent	Contract Tester	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/agents/contract-tester.agent.md	Adds contract tests for interface boundaries (schemas/types), ensuring breaking changes are caught early.
agent	Flake Hunter	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/agents/flake-hunter.agent.md	Diagnoses and eliminates flaky tests; hardens locators, waits, and fixtures; improves reproducibility.
agent	Quality Engineer	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/agents/quality-engineer.agent.md	Plans and implements deterministic tests and test seams, prioritising critical paths and reducing flakiness.
agent	Quality Gate Reviewer	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/agents/quality-gate-reviewer.agent.md	Reviews changes for evidence of correctness: tests, determinism, coverage of critical paths, and maintainability.
agent	Test Implementer	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/agents/test-implementer.agent.md	Implements tests and fixtures with repo conventions; avoids flakiness and keeps execution fast.
agent	Test Planner	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/agents/test-planner.agent.md	Detects test stack, defines critical paths, and writes a minimal high-impact test plan.

skill	contract-testing-seams	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/skills/contract-testing-seams/SKILL.md	Add contract tests for boundary interfaces and prevent accidental breaking changes.
skill	critical-path-inventory	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/skills/critical-path-inventory/SKILL.md	Define and maintain a critical path inventory (top flows) and map them to tests to prevent regressions.
skill	deterministic-testing	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/skills/deterministic-testing/SKILL.md	Make tests deterministic by controlling time, randomness, IO boundaries, and using stable locators and waits.
skill	flake-triage	Packs/copilot-quality-engineer-pack/.github/skills/flake-triage/SKILL.md	Systematically diagnose and eliminate flaky tests and reduce future flake risk.
agent	Build Hardener	Packs/copilot-release-supplychain-pack/.github/agents/build-hardener.agent.md	Hardens builds for repeatability and supply-chain hygiene: pin toolchains, lock dependencies, reduce nondeterminism.
agent	Provenance Attestor	Packs/copilot-release-supplychain-pack/.github/agents/provenance-attestor.agent.md	Configures build provenance attestations (SLSA provenance) using CI-native mechanisms (e.g., GitHub artifact attestations).
agent	Release Notes Curator	Packs/copilot-release-supplychain-pack/.github/agents/release-notes-curator.agent.md	Curates changelog and release notes: highlights, breaking changes, migrations, security notes, and known issues.
agent	Release & Supply Chain Engineer	Packs/copilot-release-supplychain-pack/.github/agents/release-supplychain-engineer.agent.md	Makes releases repeatable and auditable: provenance attestations, SBOMs, verification, and curated release notes.
agent	SBOM Maintainer	Packs/copilot-release-supplychain-pack/.github/agents/sbom-maintainer.agent.md	Generates and publishes SBOMs (CycloneDX or SPDX) for release artifacts and ensures linkage to versions and checksums.
agent	Verifier	Packs/copilot-release-supplychain-pack/.github/agents/verifier.agent.md	Adds verification steps/scripts for artifacts, attestations, and SBOM integrity and explains how to validate a release.

agent	ASVS Mapper	Packs/copilot-security-gatekeeper-pack/.github/agents/asvs-mapper.agent.md	Maps scoped changes to OWASP ASVS requirements and produces a concrete checklist and implementation notes.
agent	Secure Implementer	Packs/copilot-security-gatekeeper-pack/.github/agents/secure-implementer.agent.md	Implements security mitigations with minimal diffs: authz, validation, safe errors, rate limiting, secrets hygiene, and tests.
agent	Security Gatekeeper	Packs/copilot-security-gatekeeper-pack/.github/agents/security-gatekeeper.agent.md	Threat-models changes, maps to OWASP ASVS, enforces safe error handling, and blocks risky deps before shipping.
agent	Security Reviewer	Packs/copilot-security-gatekeeper-pack/.github/agents/security-reviewer.agent.md	Ruthlessly reviews changes for common vuln classes and verification completeness; produces exact fixes.
